channel.title: Introduction on MP DevOps Series
channel.description: Recent content in Introduction on MP DevOps Series

item.title: Foreword
item.description: How did we get here? Set the stage for the audience, this page isn’t mandatory but can be a page for the hook in the story you’re trying to tell.

item.title: The Technical Challenge/Problem
item.description: What is the problem Effective workshops require an important and common problem that the partner’s solution will solve. What is the problem?

item.title: Who is this partner?
item.description: What is {insert partner name}? How did the Partner come to be? What’s the history of the industry, and how did they get started?

item.title: Workshop Next Steps
item.description: Workshop Prerequisites There are a few prerequisite tasks you must perform before getting started on this workshop. These are: Access to an AWS account w/ proper permissions A Cloud9 IDE Workspace Sign-up for partner’s free trial to use solution (if necessary) In the next section, there will be instructions on how to set everything up, step by step.
